name: microcookiepkg
description: MicroCookie - A minuscule cookie library. Nothing but bones. Compatible with every single browser.

scripts.ugly: if [ ! -d  export ]; then mkdir export; fi && uglifyjs microcookie.js -o export/microcookie-min.js -m reserved=\[k,v,p,e,s,d,w,m,y\] --comments -c passes=3

author: Nathan Hedge (10Nates)
